accountingPeriod.title: The accounting period
accountingPeriod.description: The duration of the business income source operations to be included in the tax year submission. 2019-20 is the earliest tax year to which the accounting period can be assigned.

startDate.description: The date the accounting period began.

endDate.description: The date the accounting period finished. for example 2019-04-30. The accounting period must end in the tax year to which it is assigned. For MTD submissions 2019-20 is the earliest tax year in which an accounting period can end.
